entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @RussVought45 @USTreasury 1.55 million Americans infected with COVID-19 and 93,618 (and climbing) Americans dead. It isn’t even Memorial Day! You can promote every quack who validates your insane policies that you want but sane Americans are going to listen to science. #TrumpPandemic
